main event: A UFO was reported moving west, shooting flames and white smoke, on May 30, 1958.
interesting points: The object appeared to be falling while emitting flames and smoke., The sighting was categorized as possibly being a balloon., Witnesses included individuals who reported seeing lights and strange occurrences in the sky., There were discussions about the possibility of the sightings being experimental craft or natural phenomena., The law enforcement showed skepticism towards the reports of UFOs in the area.
witness description: Two individuals, Hank Mollohan and Barker, discussed their observations regarding the UFO sighting.
